channel.title: How much do you think I could get for
channel.description:
- An Xbox 360 (Not arcade or elite, whatever is in between.) + Hard drive
- 1 wireless controller
- X11 Turtle beaches (in great condition
Games: Black ops World at War Modern warfare 2 Call of duty 4 Grand theft auto 4 Mlb 2k8 Halo 3 Rainbow six vegas Red dead redemption Oblivion Nba live 09 Civilization revolution Ufc undisuputed
inb4 over 9000

item.title: How much do you think I could get for
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I would give you 200$ cash for it all.

Read full topic
item.source: How much do you think I could get for

item.title: How much do you think I could get for
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:17, topic:395383”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=492568.msg3601479#msg3601479 date=1305606983]
Just sold an Xbox 360 Elite with a 250 gb hard drive, 2 controllers, Red Dead Redemption, Beatles Rockband with the guitar & drums, and a wireless adapter for $250. So base your prices off that Honestly, I’d say about $300, $350 max.
[/quote]you sold it on ebay/craigslist or to a store?[/quote]
To a friend, and he was being generous :\ I wasn’t getting near $200 on craigslist, and the stores were giving me less than that. So it all depends on who you sell it to.

Read full topic
item.source: How much do you think I could get for

item.source: How much do you think I could get for

item.title: How much do you think I could get for
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:14, topic:395383”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=492568.msg3601443#msg3601443 date=1305603567]

[quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=492568.msg3601441#msg3601441 date=1305603085]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=492568.msg3601438#msg3601438 date=1305602856]

Since they are “used” games, I’d buy them all for $20 like Gamestop does.

Don’t rag on them too much. I brought in a shitload (like 10-15, so not really alot) of PSP games I had (made a ISO backup for each one on comp before doing this) and (if i wanted one) could have gotten a PS3, but instead I cashed in for a few pre-orders. It really depends on the games though, I have brought in 5 games and only gotten $20 for them. As long as it wasn’t complete shit, you will get a decent enough sale, more than what you would get as a garage sale at least.

@OP - The biggest price range is going to revolve around the size of the HDD. I have a 120GB in my Arcade (don’t rag, i got it for $150 as well as a few thrown-in games/such) and bought the elite HDD for $40 on Ebay. Anyways, back on topic, what size is your HDD? Most people won’t even want a 20GB, and some push away the 60GB (like me) even. My guess is, if you have a 20GB, around $200 max, with the 60GB, My guess is between 200-260. With the 120, prolly somewhere between $260-300. Of course, (like im doing atm) if you were to mod the HDD and install a 750GB, it would majorly increase all of that lmfao.
[/quote]it’s 60gb. i had to buy a new one. i was 20. i actually have a really funny story about that though

PM me story? Also, until it’s sold, we should play RDR together
[/quote]alright i’ll try to get on tomorrow night xD and i’ll pm you right now

Alright, and do you have my Gamertag? Haven’t been on in a while, but if I do know you (i think I do) is yours something about a squirrel?
[/quote]eskimo squrl

soharuda? i think?[/quote]
Yup. Keep in mind, my internet is snail-pace, so I will prolly be skipping around lmfao.

Read full topic
item.source: How much do you think I could get for
